name: Verify airport search is case sensitive
description:
This test verifies that airport name matching is case-sensitive
and that the exact airport names are returned as expected.

steps.name: Get test airports with different case variations
Test case sensitivity for each required airport
Attach JSON data: 'Case Sensitivity Test Results'

parameters.name: data
parameters.value: {'case_variations_tested': {'Akureyri Airport': {'original': 'Akureyri Airport', 'lowercase': 'akureyri airport', 'uppercase': 'AKUREYRI AIRPORT', 'title_case': 'Akureyri Airport'}, 'St. Anthony Airport': {'original': 'St. Anthony Airport', 'lowercase': 'st. anthony airport', 'uppercase': 'ST. ANTHONY AIRPORT', 'title_case': 'St. Anthony Airport'}, 'CFB Bagotville': {'original': 'CFB Bagotville', 'lowercase': 'cfb bagotville', 'uppercase': 'CFB BAGOTVILLE', 'title_case': 'Cfb Bagotville'}}, 'case_test_results': [{'airport': 'Akureyri Airport', 'exact_match': True, 'lowercase_match': False, 'uppercase_match': False, 'title_case_match': True}, {'airport': 'St. Anthony Airport', 'exact_match': True, 'lowercase_match': False, 'uppercase_match': False, 'title_case_match': True}, {'airport': 'CFB Bagotville', 'exact_match': True, 'lowercase_match': False, 'uppercase_match': False, 'title_case_match': False}]}

steps.name: Verify exact case matching works correctly

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: 'Airport 'Akureyri Airport' should be found with exact case matching'

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: 'Airport 'Akureyri Airport' should not match lowercase version'

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: 'Airport 'St. Anthony Airport' should be found with exact case matching'

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: 'Airport 'St. Anthony Airport' should not match lowercase version'
